duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify potential philanthropic prospects and perform extensive research to support effective fundraising and strategic planning.
Coordinate with Sr. Director of Prospect Development to develop operational analytics program/system and related visualization tools.
Conduct detailed research using public, proprietary, purchased or leased databases to identify potential donors and funding sources.
Develop and maintain ongoing, collaborative relationships with University staff and partners.
Create, maintain, and generate accurate and consistent reports, visualizations, and ad-hoc analyses that inform decisions and evaluate outcomes.
Facilitate prospect strategy sessions and partner with University Relations staff in managing and building prospect pipelines and portfolio management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (Master's preferred)
